item.description:
Hello, ladies!

The theme of the first get together of the Brunch Club has changed.

Due to the space restrictions at the Beehive, we're going to meet for drinks. This will be a great way for everyone to chat in a more casual environment.

While there, feel free to grab a bite at the bar or at a table.

I plan to arrive at the restaurant around 2:15 that afternoon; I'll be the girl in the dark-framed glasses with dark blond shoulder length hair sitting at the downstairs bar.

See you there!

Lindsay
item.name: Brunch/Drinks Club!
